post.body: Are you snowed in, Mary Jo? What a mess. I fell last night helping my daughter dig out the car. I laughed but feel it 2day.
Thanks for the link, Mitch. Wow, Jets/Bills close. Good game.
Thanks, Paulette. Appreciate the link.
Wow, now that's a lot of behind kicking.
I knew your afternoon would be delightful. Good for you! What a terrific event I look forward hearing more about.
I bet the event is spectacular. You are going to enjoy it.
Courtyard is my first choice when traveling. I'll be at Marriott LAX in March with no comp high-speed. Boo hoo.
That's SoloBusinessMarketing.com.
New at SoloBusinessMarketing.com - How do you re-commit to marketing for great results in 2009? Here's where to start - http://bit.ly/3a8bLv
Gift Basket Business - Here's Your Last-Minute Order Plan http://aweber.com/b/1O9.V
New at SoloBusinessMarketing.com - Flea markets contain more than merchandise. Here's the marketing lesson I learned, http://bit.ly/W8Xo
New at SoloBusinessMarketing.com - Does your mind say no when it's time to market? Here's how to hush it, http://bit.ly/GRfX
When U love what U do, it's scary how fast time flies. That's why I segment my projects to 1 or 1-1/2 hours at the most for productivity.
My husband said a journalist in Iraq took off his shoes and threw them at Pres. Bush. Where's the video? Can't find it online - yet.
This is the 3rd week I've saved $10+ at supermarkets by catching errors & getting stuff free. Watch the scanner rather than pack groceries.
I'm preparing all of my blog posts now so that my week focuses solely on long-term projects.
Bob Bly's 21 secrets of freelance copywriting secrets are terrific and can be converted to work for every business, http://bit.ly/f1Ed
New at SoloBusinessMarketing.com - Solo marketers can make marketing videos on their own. Here's how, http://bit.ly/GCo7
Rainy, wet day in the NYC area. Good day to film a series of videos for my membership only site as well as teaser videos for YouTube.
Gift Basket Business - Get the Media to Maximize Your Sales http://aweber.com/b/WxdF
